channel.title: Medium Feel
channel.description: A lab for brand, marketing, and AI. Exploring how communication is changing as AI reshapes how brands think, make, and show up.

item.title: What I Didn't Build Told Me More Than What I Did
item.description: Everything I parked pointed at the same problem. What you defer tells you more about the real problem than what you build.
item.author: tyler@mediumfeel.com (Tyler Kemp)

item.title: The Best Thing Claude Code Taught Me Was Something I Already Knew
item.description: The most valuable thing I built wasn't code. It was a list of everything I didn't build.
item.author: tyler@mediumfeel.com (Tyler Kemp)

item.title: I've Spent My Career on Other People's Projects. Here's What Happened When I Started Building My Own.
item.description: The entry point wasn't technical. It was the work I already do.
item.author: tyler@mediumfeel.com (Tyler Kemp)

item.title: Shipping the Lab: A Build Log
item.description: How I built and shipped the Medium Feel website in a half-day using Claude Code, with no coding experience. A build log documenting the first experiment.
item.author: tyler@mediumfeel.com (Tyler Kemp)
